channel.title: Comments on: (Very) Poor Man’s Infinite Scroll using angular-inview
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Mariela
item.dc:creator: Mariela
item.description:
Could it be that the plunker doesn't work anymore?
Could you help me on this?
I have a function to play a video on scroll when visible with that same plugin but is not working for me. Maybe a plugin update crushed the functionality or something like that...
item.content:encoded:
Could it be that the plunker doesn’t work anymore?

Could you help me on this?

I have a function to play a video on scroll when visible with that same plugin but is not working for me. Maybe a plugin update crushed the functionality or something like that…

item.title: By: Nate Ross
item.dc:creator: Nate Ross
item.description: Awesome work! I made edited a version of you plunk to show how to use it with a table. http://plnkr.co/edit/QM2DclvfaybAi9vY8Nnh?p=preview
item.content:encoded:
Awesome work!
I made edited a version of you plunk to show how to use it with a table.
http://plnkr.co/edit/QM2DclvfaybAi9vY8Nnh?p=preview

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: Thanks for sharing your solution. We're currently working on a complex project using ASP.MVC and angularJS, so solutions such as this one may be handy in our project as well.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing your solution. We’re currently working on a complex project using ASP.MVC and angularJS, so solutions such as this one may be handy in our project as well.
